metaTitle: VENECIA V Polop | Luxury Villas From €725,000
metaDescription: Discover VENECIA V in Polop, Alicante. Luxury 4-bedroom villas from €725,000 by LARCOSTA. Completed December 2026. Prime location near beaches and golf.

content.heroIntro: Welcome to VENECIA V, an exclusive residential development by renowned developer LARCOSTA, located in the desirable Urbanizaciones area of Polop, Alicante. This prestigious project offers just 2 exceptional 4-bedroom villas, each featuring 306m² of meticulously designed living space on 366m² private plots. VENECIA V represents the pinnacle of Costa Blanca living, combining modern architecture with quality construction standards, scheduled for delivery on 01-12-2026. Starting from €725,000, these stunning villas provide an outstanding investment opportunity in one of Spain's most sought-after regions. The development caters to discerning buyers seeking luxury, privacy, and accessibility to world-class amenities including championship golf courses, pristine Blue Flag beaches, and excellent healthcare facilities. LARCOSTA's commitment to excellence ensures each villa is built to the highest standards, featuring premium finishes, contemporary design, and all the modern conveniences today's buyers demand. Whether you're seeking a permanent residence, holiday home, or investment property, VENECIA V offers exceptional value, combining 40% savings compared to Spanish island markets with proven rental potential of €800 per week.

locationSection.intro: Polop's Urbanizaciones district represents one of the Costa Blanca's most vibrant and well-established residential communities. This charming area, nestled between the Mediterranean coast and inland pine forests, offers the perfect balance of peaceful countryside living and convenient urban access. The region has become particularly popular with international buyers seeking authentic Spanish lifestyle combined with modern amenities. Urbanizaciones Polop attracts families, retirees, and investors alike, thanks to its strong expat community where English is widely spoken, excellent educational facilities including international schools with British curriculum options, and comprehensive healthcare services. The area benefits from strategic location advantages: within 30 minutes of Alicante Airport, a short drive to multiple Blue Flag beaches, and surrounded by several championship golf courses. Local infrastructure includes well-stocked supermarkets including Mercadona, Lidl, and Consum, plus traditional Spanish markets offering fresh local produce. The established community ensures excellent amenities, reliable transport connections, and a welcoming environment for international residents.
highlights: Airport: 30 minutes to Alicante International Airport (ALC)
Beach: Multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes drive
Golf: Several championship courses nearby including prestigious layouts
Hospital: Regional hospital within 30 minutes, Private clinics with English-speaking doctors
Shopping: Mercadona, Lidl, Consum supermarkets plus traditional Spanish markets
Restaurants: Diverse dining options ranging from tapas bars to international cuisine

propertyFeatures.intro: VENECIA V villas exemplify contemporary Mediterranean design combined with robust construction standards. Each property is built using high-quality materials and modern building techniques, ensuring durability, energy efficiency, and long-term value. The developers have incorporated sustainable building practices while maintaining luxury finishes throughout. Every villa features state-of-the-art systems and premium specifications that reflect LARCOSTA's reputation for excellence. The attention to detail in design and execution creates homes that are not only beautiful but also practical and comfortable for modern family living.
features: Private swimming pool with heating system
Double glazing with thermal break insulation
Large terrace areas for outdoor living

content.investmentSection: VENECIA V represents a compelling investment opportunity in Polop's booming property market. The area has demonstrated consistent growth with property values increasing at +8% year-on-year, significantly outperforming many European markets. The development's pricing at approximately €2,200 per square meter positions it 40% below comparable luxury markets in Spanish island destinations like Mallorca and Ibiza, offering exceptional value without compromising quality. Rental income potential is substantial, with similar properties commanding €800 per week for short-term vacation rentals, translating to annual gross yields exceeding 20%. The established international community and strong tourism infrastructure in Polop ensure reliable rental demand throughout the year. LARCOSTA's proven development track record, combined with Polop's strategic location between Alicante's cultural attractions and the Costa Blanca's natural beauty, creates multiple value drivers. Whether purchasing for personal use or investment purposes, VENECIA V offers security, growth potential, and genuine lifestyle benefits that justify the investment decision.
whyBuySection: Strategic location in prestigious Urbanizaciones, Polop
Trusted developer LARCOSTA with established reputation
Only 2 exclusive villas ensuring exclusivity and community quality
Generous plot sizes (366m²) provide privacy and expansion potential
Established international community with English widely spoken
Easy access to Multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes
Several championship golf courses nearby for enthusiasts
Regional hospital within 30 minutes with English-speaking doctors
40% less expensive than comparable Spanish island markets
Proven rental income potential of €800 per week

faqs.question: What is the price of properties in VENECIA V?
faqs.answer: VENECIA V villas start from €725,000. The development features 4-bedroom villas with 306m² of living space. With only 2 units available, these exclusive properties represent excellent value. Contact us via WhatsApp for current availability and detailed pricing information.

faqs.question: When will VENECIA V be completed?
faqs.answer: VENECIA V is scheduled for completion on 01-12-2026. LARCOSTA provides a comprehensive 10-year structural warranty covering all major components. We can provide specific delivery schedules and payment plans upon request.

faqs.question: Who is the developer of VENECIA V?
faqs.answer: LARCOSTA is the developer of VENECIA V. They have an established track record building quality residential properties throughout Polop and the Costa Blanca region, with numerous successful projects completed to the highest standards.

faqs.question: Is Polop a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. Polop offers excellent value with property values increasing at +8% year-on-year. The area features an established international community where English is commonly spoken, making integration straightforward. Excellent amenities include a regional hospital within 30 minutes, multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes, several championship golf courses, international schools, and comprehensive shopping facilities including Mercadona and Lidl.

faqs.question: How far is VENECIA V from the beach?
faqs.answer: VENECIA V is approximately 20 minutes' drive from multiple Blue Flag beaches. The Costa Blanca's pristine coastline with award-winning beach facilities, water sports, and beach clubs is easily accessible for weekend getaways or regular leisure activities.

faqs.question: What amenities are near VENECIA V?
faqs.answer: Nearby amenities include: Mercadona and Lidl supermarkets for shopping, regional hospital within 30 minutes with English-speaking doctors, several championship golf courses within short drive, multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes, international schools with British curriculum options, diverse restaurants and tapas bars, and traditional Spanish markets for fresh local produce.

faqs.question: Can I rent out my VENECIA V villa?
faqs.answer: Yes, the rental market in Polop is strong. Similar properties achieve approximately €800 per week for short-term vacation rentals, providing substantial income potential. The established tourism infrastructure and international community create consistent demand throughout the year.

faqs.question: What is included in the property price?
faqs.answer: The €725,000 price includes the villa with fitted kitchen and premium appliances, private swimming pool, air conditioning pre-installation, double glazing, private parking, storage room, landscaped gardens, quality ceramic flooring, modern bathroom fixtures, and video entry system.

faqs.question: Is Costa Blanca a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Yes, the Costa Blanca is one of Spain's most desirable property markets. It combines exceptional climate, world-class beaches, established healthcare and educational facilities, and a thriving international community. Property values show consistent growth, and rental yields are competitive, making it attractive for both personal residence and investment purposes.

faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreigners can purchase property in Spain without significant restrictions. You'll need an NIE (Tax Identification Number), but the process is straightforward. Professional legal advice is recommended to navigate Spanish property law and tax implications.

content.conclusion: VENECIA V by LARCOSTA represents a rare opportunity to acquire luxury villas in one of the Costa Blanca's most desirable locations. With only 2 exclusive units available, this development offers the perfect combination of privacy, quality construction, and exceptional value. Whether you're seeking a permanent Spanish residence, holiday home, or investment property with proven rental income potential, VENECIA V delivers on every front. The established Polop community welcomes international residents, excellent amenities are readily accessible, and property values continue to appreciate. The December 2026 delivery timeline provides time for careful consideration while securing your place in this exclusive development. Don't miss this opportunity to invest in premium Costa Blanca real estate. Contact us today via WhatsApp for detailed information, site visits, payment plans, and personalized guidance through the purchase process. Our experienced team is ready to help you make this important investment decision.
